name: Run Tank Run
description:
RUN TANK RUN

Run Tank Run is a parkour game where you drive a tank and rush forward along a straight road to reach the goal within a time limit.

INFO


On the road, you'll encounter other vehicles blocking your way. Use your superior driving skills to avoid them, or turn your tank's cannon and blast them away.

Each time you fire and hit a vehicle, you can gain extra time, and if you achieve consecutive hits, you can accumulate combo points and earn bonus time based on your maximum combo. However, you need to reload your ammo after each shot, during which time you'll be unable to fire again. If you get stuck in traffic, you'll be helpless, and the smoke from the destroyed vehicles will block your vision, making it hard to see ahead. You need to make quick decisions about whether to continue firing to extend your time or to use your ammo to clear obstacles.


Remember that you're driving a tank, a powerful vehicle that can also ram other vehicles aside. However, this action can cause damage to your tank, slow you down, and interrupt your combo. Use it wisely.

STAGES

The road is not always the same, and you need to adapt to different conditions:

● The wide and bright forest road is always friendly at the beginning.

● The dark temple ruins trail will obscure your view of the road ahead.

● The crowded city roads have narrow two-lane roads with fixed obstacles, but there are also clever spaces outside the lanes that you can use.

● Space offers a magical environment with unexpected hazards.

POWERFULL TANKS


The game offers 14 different World War II tanks, each with its own unique characteristics such as high acceleration, top speed, thick armor, or short reload time. Try to earn rewards and unlock all of them by completing each level.

CHALLENGE MODE


Challenge mode is available for each environment you pass. In this mode, you will run at same road, and there are random vehicles that can add more time or repair your tank on the road. Use these advantages to see how far you can go before the countdown ends.

MORE

The game supports playing at multiple resolutions, and playing on ultrawide or vertical screens adds more fun.
